A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star wars The last jedi is a mess. The plot was just all over the place and completely contradicts the lore of star wars\, even more by setting up mysteries in the previous films only to giving you scratching your head with its answers\,  plot holes are there\, character backgrounds is not explained\, 



in the end im very worried with the next installment with how much a problem this movie gave to the next director to helm the next film\,the only thing i could say mark hamill was right.
